verses.name: 2 Kings 15:36
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Jotham, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:37
verses.text: In those days the Lord began to send against Judah Rezin the king of Syria, and Pekah the son of Remaliah.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:38
verses.text: And Jotham slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David his father: and Ahaz his son reigned in his stead.
